sentences.en: An eight-week-old embryo is only an inch long.
sentences.cn: 8星期大的胚胎只有一英寸长。

sentences.en: At seven weeks, an embryo is about three-fourths of an inch long and recognizably human.
sentences.cn: 在第7周的时候，胚胎有3/4英寸长，人形已清晰可辨。

sentences.en: Embryo has most commonly eitht genetically identical haploid nuclei.
sentences.cn: 胚囊,普通具有8个遗传上相同的单倍体核.

sentences.en: Embryo research is an emotive issue.
sentences.cn: 胚胎研究是个容易引起激烈争论的问题。

sentences.en: Even in an immature seed the embryo is sufficiently well developed.
sentences.cn: 甚至在未成熟的种子中,胚已充分发育.

sentences.en: Heat - denatured wheat endosperm prevented the growth of an embryo implanted on it.
sentences.cn: 热变性的小麦胚乳能阻止移植在其上的胚的生长.

sentences.en: If the gene is present, a human embryo will go on to develop as a male.
sentences.cn: 如果这种基因存在，人类胚胎就会发育为男性。

sentences.en: It is formed by the coalescence of the first three neuromeres in the embryo .
sentences.cn: 它是由胚胎时的前三个神经原节愈合而成的。

sentences.en: It was an embryo idea rather than a fully worked proposal.
sentences.cn: 这只是初步的想法，并非成形的提议。

sentences.en: The embryo lives in the amniotic cavity.
The mother provides the embryo with nourishment and a place to grow.
sentences.cn: 母亲为胎儿提供营养和成长的空间。

sentences.en: The sex of the embryo is predetermined at fertilization.
sentences.cn: 胚胎的性别早在受精时就决定了。

sentences.en: The system already exists in embryo.
There are 24,000 frozen embryos in clinics across the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地的诊所里有24000个冷冻胚胎。

sentences.en: These developments were foreseen in embryo more than a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 这些发展早在十多年前的萌芽阶段就已预见到。

sentences.en: These substances are slowly depleted as the embryo commences to grow.
sentences.cn: 随着胚开始生长,这些物质也慢慢用尽了.

phrases.tran_cn: 胚胎移植；胚胎转移；胚胎植入
在胚胎阶段；在未成熟时期

trans.tran_en: an animal or human that has not yet been born, and has just begun to develop
